alert.note: Alert for Bryan; Chatham; Liberty (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 4:24PM EDT until April 26 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BRYAN...LIBERTY AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 423 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Richmond Hill, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 420 pm tennis ball size hail was reported in Richmond Hill GA. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include: Richmond Hill, Windsor Forest, Coffee Bluff, Montgomery, Vernonburg, Fort Mcallister, Belfast, Burroughs, Keller, and Sunbury. This warning includes I-95 in Georgia between mile markers 81 and 91. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
